about:
Hi👋, 
My Name ist **Malte**. I'm a 30-something year old guy from Germany.
Currently I am working as a Senior Engineer at Interhyp in Munich 💻🥨🍺. 
I would describe myself as a Backend Developer (mostly Java/Kotlin) **trying** to become a Full-Stack Developer.

**Stuff i like** 
programming & gaming 👨‍💻🎮
running & badminton 🏃🏸️
thisPage: **What to expect of this page?** Although this site is only a hobby project, i hope to update it regularly to show progress on my projects... 🔜
disclaimer: **DISCLAIMER:** This portfolio-page is forked from the work of [Mayank Agarwal](https://github.com/mayankagarwal09/dev-portfolio) & some Free Icons used from [Icons8](https://icons8.com/) 🚀
